about_the_game:
The Imitator Protocol was developed to be the perfect assistant to virtual combat simulation, capable of adapting to the user's input and forcing him to change strategies. Unfortunately, the girl-genius Bastille did such a good job that the program went rogue, and now her robot companion B3X3 is trapped in the virtual landscape. The only way to get out is to destroy the Alpha-Imitator from the inside while trying to survive the hordes of malware he sends in B3X3's direction. Get ready to fight for your binary life as AI faces AI in deadly combat. Who will use the Electronic Evolution to get the ultimate advantage?

Play Inside a Comic Book!


Electronic Evolution is inspired by classic superhero stories, and the whole adventure takes place on the pages and panels of a comic book issue. With hand-drawn animation and filled with comic book effects, Electronic Evolution will allow you to take control of a superhero and feel powerful while beating up an evergrowing army of enemies. So get ready for an epic adventure to take down a supervillain and save the world!

Arcade Roguelite Experience


Electronic Evolution is an action roguelite, inspired by arcade experiences, and with a permanent progression system that reflects modern game design sensibilities. Electronic Evolution features:

    Random Levels: The Alpha-Imitator is spreading through Bastille's database, and it will use all the info he can get about the superheroine's previous adventures to create ever-changing challenges that B3X3 must face inside the simulation.

    Permanent Progression System: As B3X3 fights against the Alpha-Imitator, he'll get more Data Points that allow him to evolve his own program, becoming stronger and more capable of taking control of the simulation back.

    Customizable Weapons and Attachments: Bastille might be safe outside the simulation, but that doesn't mean she won't fight back; as B3X3 learns about the Alpha-Imitator weakness, Bastille can upload new Blueprints to help her robotic friend to defend himself against the malware.

    Evolving Difficulty: B3X3 and Bastille are not the only ones who can adapt; the Alpha-Imitator will create new Anomalies and even upgraded versions of levels to make sure B3X3 remains busy while the evil malware spread through Bastille's systems and tries to contaminate the whole world.

name: Electronic Evolution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6200
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The Imitator Protocol was supposed to be the perfect combat simulation. However, something went wrong, and now you are trapped in the virtual world. Get ready to fight the corrupt Alpha-Imitator in this hand-drawn roguelite inspired by classic superhero comic books.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
